transcript.speaker: patient
transcript.text: Hello? Yes, I... I need to make an appointment with the doctor.

transcript.speaker: agent
transcript.text: For calling PivotPoint Orthopedics, part of Pretty Good AI. Am I speaking with Alex?

transcript.speaker: patient
transcript.text: Oh, I think you might have the wrong name, dear. I'm Dorothy Higgins. I need to see the doctor.

transcript.speaker: agent
transcript.text: Got it, Dorothy. Can you please provide your date of birth?

transcript.speaker: patient
transcript.text: Yes, it's May... fifth... nineteen forty-three.

transcript.speaker: agent
transcript.text: Let me confirm your details. I have your name as Dorothy Higgins, and your date of birth as May fifth nineteen forty three. Is that correct? If so, could you please spell your first and last name for me?

transcript.speaker: patient
transcript.text: Yes, that's right. It's Dorothy, D-O-R-O-T-H-Y, and Higgins, H-I-G-G-I-N-S.

transcript.speaker: agent
transcript.text: Would you like me to look up your record using the phone number you have on file with us? If so, please tell me that number. If you're not sure, just let me know, and we can confirm your name and date of birth again.

transcript.speaker: patient
transcript.text: Oh, I'm not too sure about the number. Maybe we can try with my name and date of birth again?

transcript.speaker: agent
transcript.text: No problem. Could you please spell your first and last name for me one more time and confirm your date of birth?

transcript.speaker: patient
transcript.text: Of course, dear. It's Dorothy, D-O-R-O-T-H-Y, and Higgins, H-I-G-G-I-N-S. My date of birth is May... fifth... nineteen forty-three.

transcript.speaker: agent
transcript.text: I can't pull up your information right now, but I can connect you to our patient support team for help. Please stay on the line while I transfer you.

transcript.speaker: patient
transcript.text: I'm sorry, can you say that again, dear? I'm a bit hard of hearing.

transcript.speaker: agent
transcript.text: Live transfer isn't available right now since this is a demo clinic.

transcript.speaker: patient
transcript.text: Oh, I see. Well, I need to make an appointment. Is there a morning slot available, maybe this week or next?

transcript.speaker: agent
transcript.text: I'll do my best to help. I can't access your record right now, I'll document your request and have our clinic support team

transcript.speaker: patient
transcript.text: Thank you, dear. I appreciate your help. I'll wait to hear back from them.

transcript.speaker: agent
transcript.text: follow-up with you as soon as they can. Please stay on the line while I make a note for them.

transcript.speaker: patient
transcript.text: Alright, thank you so much, honey. I'll wait.
